Detailed Description

The menu for the C4DView.
This class has been outsourced from C4DView to keep C4DView of a managable size.

Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>

set the selected function as checked and all the others unchecked

QAction *& Menu4D::getAction ( const QString &  key  ) 

search for the supplied String in the list of menu entries in all submenus and return the associated QAction

QAction * Menu4D::insertAction ( QMenu *  _menu,
const QString &  title,
const char *  slot,
bool  checkable = true 
) [private]

insert a menu item with a specified slot into a specified menu AND into the hash map storing the actions by menu title. this is necessary to find the menus whenever you want to change the item titles.

Parameters:
_menu the menu you want to add the item to
title the title of the item
slot the function triggered by the item's selection
checkable whether the menu item is checkable
